title: This affordable 2 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom home is available
posting_body: This beautiful two-bedroom and two-and-a-half-bathroom rental home in Norcross, Georgia, is sure to draw your gaze.
The house provides two stories and 1,259 square feet of living space.
The eat-in kitchen offers numerous cabinets, a sink with dual basins for easy washing, and stylish black appliances.
With hardwood flooring and plenty of light, the living room has sliding glass doors that lead out to the screened-in porch and spacious yard.
Find the main bedroom suite on the first floor complete with a bathroom with a tub/shower combo.
This smart home has central heating and cooling.
Schedule a tour of this pet-friendly property today.
